inputs.name: channel
inputs.text: The channel name where spinner events will be retrieved from. If not specified, component will listen to the default channel which displays the spinner over the whole Master Layout content.

inputs.name: fixed
inputs.text: Defines if the spinner overlay should be positioned in a fixed way (i.e. in reference to the browser viewport).

variables.name: events
variables.text: An observable that emits every time the spinner is triggered or canceled

variables.name: CHANNEL
variables.text: The default channel name for broadcasting spinner events.

variables.name: active
variables.text: Defines if the spinner should be displayed or not.

variables.name: channel
variables.text: The channel name related to this event.
